thread.title: Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard
thread.title_full: Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard

author: MICHAEL MARTINEZ
title: Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard
text:
Isaac Brekken Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard 
Brett Stegmaier hits a tee shot on the fifth hole during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken) Isaac Brekken Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard 
Brett Stegmaier waits to tee off on the sixth hole during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken) Isaac Brekken Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard 
Brett Stegmaier lines up a putt on the fourth hole during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken) Isaac Brekken Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard 
Chad Campbell chips onto the 18th green during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken) Isaac Brekken Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard 
Chad Campbell hits a tee shot on the 13th hole during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken) Isaac Brekken Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard 
Nick Taylor hits a tee shot on the first hole during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken) Isaac Brekken Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard 
David Hearn hits a tee shot on the 11th hole during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken) Isaac Brekken Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard 
Patton Kizzie eyes a putt on the 18th green during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken) Isaac Brekken Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard 
Nick Watney hits from a bunker on the 17th hole during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken) Isaac Brekken Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard 
Nick Watney hits a tee shot on the 16th hole during the second round of the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open golf tournament Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/Isaac Brekken) Brett Stegmaier tops Las Vegas leaderboard Associated Press | 
LAS VEGAS (AP) — Brett Stegmaier topped the leaderboard Friday in the Shriners Hospitals for Children Open in only his fifth career start on the PGA Tour. 
The 32-year-old former University of Florida player was 6 under for the round and 11 under overall with three holes left when second-round play was suspended because of darkness. He will resume play Saturday morning with a 14-foot birdie putt on the par-4 seventh. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.   Need an account?
